Description: Fernandes metallic grey , sustainer system. Fernandes tremolo, 24 frets. Plays great. Sustainer has harmonic option on knob. Mini switch works Sustainer, volume knob activates harmonic sustainer. i believe it is a Fernandes Revolver model, not sure however. The headstock is blank, ( look at pics, got it that way way back when purchased ) Has 2 very small nicks. One on upper bout edge towards player, 2/8ths long by 1/8th wide ( see pic #11 ). The second is the size of small pencil lead, ( 1/16x 1/32 ) & it's located on upper side edge. Neither one is noticeable when playing. Other minor pick marks etc here, & there, as most player guitars. Sustainer allows you to hold a note indefinitely, or it's harmonic, one knob controls the length of the sustain, the mini- switch turns sustainer on/off, the push/pull knob controls whether regular, or harmonic sustain. Great shape, fast neck, great frets, you will not be disappointed, bid with confidence, look at my feedback. No case, no bag, will pack carefully, & fully insured. No International bidders. Will only ship to contiguous 48 states.
Title: Fernandes guitar with  Sustainer Great shape, metallic gray.
ConditionDescription: Fernandes guitar with factory Sustainer pick up. Metallic grey, great shape. Has harmonic option on mini switch.
